topics.body: Okay, I have a question. The Marks that Yusei, Crow, other characters get. I know what they are and what there purpose is. But my question is this. Why are they so different? The entire point of them is to basically brand them as criminals and track their location if the need arises. So why are they personalized? Wouldn't it make more sense to have them all the same?
